SmartComponent.name: RSCompareCloudsOfPoints
SmartComponent.description: Compare and manage two bin Cloud of Points. Colored from green for same Z to Red for maximal amplitude.

DynamicProperty.name: FileName_1
DynamicProperty.description: FileName of First Cloud of Points. Colored in gray if not found in other file.

DynamicProperty.name: FileName_2
DynamicProperty.description: FileName of Second Cloud of Points. Colored in gray-blue if not found in other file.

DynamicProperty.name: Unit
DynamicProperty.description: Unit/Scale of Cloud of Points. (For the next Open)

DynamicProperty.name: Epsilon
DynamicProperty.description: Roundoff for X and Y values of Cloud of Points to compare. (For the next Open)

DynamicProperty.name: Averaging
DynamicProperty.description: Averaging Z values for same X and Y point. Else only get first value. (For the next Open)

DynamicProperty.name: Transform
DynamicProperty.description: Transformation of Result Cloud of Points.

DynamicProperty.name: Visible
DynamicProperty.description: If Result Cloud of Points is visible.

IOSignal.name: Open
IOSignal.description: Open two Clouds of Points file to Compare. (Clear Olders)

IOSignal.name: Delete
IOSignal.description: Delete Clouds of Points. (Use it before removing Component)
